name: a Way aWay (Christian Villanueva)
description:
You play as Orfeo on the way back to the Upper world. You find yourself in the last part of the Underworld, and you are carrying your wife Euridice with you, but the only restriction they gave you in exchange for her, is for you to not look back. You will need to find your way out of this labrynth without checking backwards.

Controls: 

  • W,S : Forward, Backward move
  • Space (Hold): Play the lyre (After a few seconds some notes will apear and capture the souls) 
  • Q: Skip dialogues
  • Mouse: Rotate camera

Our first 3D  game developed within 72 hours for a Game Jam.

Special thanks to: Alberto Rico, Dilara Bozkurt & Isabella Kugler for your precious mentorship

Design: Raúl "Lindryn" López Martín (https://lindryn.itch.io/)

Programming: Josioque (https://josioque.itch.io/)

Art: Christian Villanueva (https://christianvillanueva.itch.io/)

Menu and Narrative: Abraham "Pirty" Juárez (https://itch.io/profile/pirty)

Free Assets: Rocks, Crystals, Fire

Enviromental music from Max Ritcher (November).
